pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Kabuto (2006, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Dark Kabuto's $(l:kabuto/devices/dark_kabuto_rider_belt)Rider Belt$(/l)$(br2)Used to swap between Dark Kabuto's $(l:kabuto/riders/dark_kabuto#masked)Masked$(/l) and $(l:kabuto/riders/dark_kabuto#rider)Rider$(/l) forms
